author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Scentre Group Says FY ‍Profit After Tax Attributable $4,217.9​ Mln, Up 41 Pct
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - Scentre Group:
* ‍FY REVENUE $2,469.6 MLN VERSUS $2,520.7 MLN​ * FY ‍PROFIT AFTER TAX ATTRIBUTABLE UP 41.0% TO $4,217.9​ MILLION
* FY PROFIT AFTER TAX ATTRIBUTABLE $ ‍4,217.9​ MILLION VERSUS $2,990.5 MILLION
* ‍FINAL DIVIDEND/DISTRIBUTIONS TO BE PAID 10.87 CPS​ * ‍FORECASTS FFO GROWTH FOR 12 MONTHS ENDING 31 DECEMBER 2018 OF APPROXIMATELY 4.0 PERCENT​
* ‍DISTRIBUTION FOR 2018 IS FORECAST TO BE 22.16 CENTS PER SECURITY​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
